review_blob: This is the one if you want to know what beer (barley wine) can be. Reminds me very much of home brew. I like the milder Sierras a lot.
Had to rate this one low. Its got great alcohol content but the amount of hops makes it nasty. Rather stick to the regular Sierra Ale.

I have totally enjoyed this ale for a long time. Maybe its a NorCal thing, but this is the one I enjoy after all those nasty "craft ales". Just a simple hobbit ale, nothing more, nothing less. And it tastes so much like the wort!
